description: Data was loaded from the ClinVar release created on April 1, 2018. The ClinVar data was loaded from a VCF file downloaded from NCBI and uploaded into BigQuery using the Google Variant Transforms tool (v0.2.0). More details: see https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/variation/docs/ClinVar_vcf_files/ and https://github.com/googlegenomics/gcp-variant-transforms

fields.description: Reference bases (hg38)
fields.name: reference_name

fields.description: Start position (0-based). Corresponds to the first base of the string of reference bases.
fields.name: start_position

fields.description: End position (0-based). Corresponds to the first base after the last base in the reference allele.
fields.name: end_position

fields.description: Reference bases (hg38)
fields.name: reference_bases

fields.description: One record for each alternate base (if any)
Alternate base.
fields.name: alt
alternate_bases

fields.description: Variant names (e.g., refSNP IDs)
fields.name: names

fields.description: Phred-scaled quality score = (-10log10)x probability of incorrect base call. Higher values imply better quality.
fields.name: quality

fields.description: List of failed filters (if any), or PASS indicating the variant has passed all filters.
fields.name: filter

fields.description: One record for each call
Name of the call.
fields.name: name

fields.description: Genotype of the call. "-1" is used in cases where the genotype is not called.
fields.name: genotype

fields.description: Phaseset of the call (if any). "*" is used in cases where the genotype is phased, but no phase set ("PS" in FORMAT) was specified.
fields.name: phaseset
call

fields.description: For included Variant: Tag-value pairs of disease database name and identifier, e.g. OMIM:NNNNNN
fields.name: CLNDISDBINCL

fields.description: Gene(s) for the variant reported as gene symbol:gene id. The gene symbol and id are delimited by a colon (:) and each pair is delimited by a vertical bar (|)
fields.name: GENEINFO

fields.description: Conflicting clinical significance for this single variant
fields.name: CLNSIGCONF

fields.description: ClinVar Allele ID
fields.name: ALLELEID

fields.description: Allele frequencies from TGP
fields.name: AF_TGP

fields.description: DbSNP ID (i.e. rs number)
fields.name: RS

fields.description: Clinical significance for this single variant
fields.name: CLNSIG

fields.description: Allele origin. One or more of the following values may be added: 0 - unknown; 1 - germline; 2 - somatic; 4 - inherited; 8 - paternal; 16 - maternal; 32 - de-novo; 64 - biparental; 128 - uniparental; 256 - not-tested; 512 - tested-inconclusive; 1073741824 - other
fields.name: ORIGIN

fields.description: Nsv accessions from dbVar for the variant. nsv and nssv are accession prefixes for variant regions and variant calls (or instances), respectively. Typically, one or more variant instances (nssv - variant calls based directly on experimental evidence) are merged into a variant region (nsv - a pair of start-stop coordinates reflecting the submitters' assertion of the region of the genome that is affected by the variant instances). https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/dbvar/content/overview/
fields.name: DBVARID

fields.description: Allele frequencies from ExAC
fields.name: AF_EXAC

fields.description: Tag-value pairs of disease database name and identifier, e.g. OMIM:NNNNNN
fields.name: CLNDISDB

fields.description: Preferred disease name in ClinVar for the concept specified by disease identifiers in CLNDISDB
fields.name: CLNDN

fields.description: ClinVar review status for the Variation ID
fields.name: CLNREVSTAT

fields.description: Comma separated list of molecular consequences in the form of Sequence Ontology ID|molecular_consequence
fields.name: MC

fields.description: Clinical significance for a haplotype or genotype that includes this variant. Reported as pairs of VariationID:clinical significance.
fields.name: CLNSIGINCL

fields.description: Variant Suspect Reason Codes. One or more of the following values may be added: 0 - unspecified, 1 - Paralog, 2 - byEST, 4 - oldAlign, 8 - Para_EST, 16 - 1kg_failed, 1024 - other
fields.name: SSR

fields.description: Allele frequencies from GO-ESP
fields.name: AF_ESP

fields.description: Clinical sourcesfor the variant, reported as tag-value pairs of database and variant identifier
fields.name: CLNVI

fields.description: For included Variant : preferred disease name in ClinVarfor the concept specified by disease identifiers in CLNDISDB
fields.name: CLNDNINCL

fields.description: Top-level (primary assembly, alt, or patch) HGVS expression. See https://varnomen.hgvs.org/
fields.name: CLNHGVS

fields.description: Variant type
fields.name: CLNVC

fields.description: Sequence Ontology id for variant type
fields.name: CLNVCSO
